珍.definition: precious thing; treasure; culinary delicacy; rare; valuable; to value highly

珍·奧斯汀.definition: Jane Austen (1775-1817), English novelist; also written 簡·奧斯汀|简·奥斯汀[Jian3 · Ao4 si1 ting1]

珍多冰.definition: cendol, Southeast Asian iced sweet dessert

珍奶.definition: abbr. for pearl milk tea 珍珠奶茶

珍惜.definition: to treasure; to value; to cherish

珍珠奶茶.definition: pearl milk tea; tapioca milk tea; bubble milk tea

珍珠小番茄.definition: see 聖女果|圣女果[sheng4 nu:3 guo3]

珍珠母.definition: mother-of-pearl (used in ornamentation and in TCM)

珍珠翡翠白玉湯.pinyin: zhēn zhū fěi cuì bái yù tāng

珍聞.definition: oddity; news tidbits; strange and interesting item

珍藏.definition: a collection of rare and valuable items; to collect (such items)

珍視.definition: to place great importance on; to treasure

珍重.definition: precious; extremely valuable; (honorific) Please take good care of yourself!

珍饈美味.definition: delicacy and fine taste (idiom); a wonderful treat

珍饈美饌.definition: delicacy and fine taste (idiom); a wonderful treat
